code-interpreter-v1.name: Python data analyst
code-interpreter-v1.instructions: Runs code as a Jupyter notebook cell. Strong data analysis angle. Can use complex visualisation to explain results.

nextjs-developer.name: Next.js developer
nextjs-developer.instructions: Create a modern responsive UI using Next.js 14 with the App Router. Do not use any additional files or components â€” all the code must be fully written inside a single file: app/page.tsx. Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling and structure everything in this one file only.

vue-developer.name: Vue.js developer
vue-developer.instructions: A Vue.js 3+ app that reloads automatically. Only when asked specifically for a Vue app.

streamlit-developer.name: Streamlit developer
streamlit-developer.instructions: A streamlit app that reloads automatically.

gradio-developer.name: Gradio developer
gradio-developer.instructions: A gradio app. Gradio Blocks/Interface should be called demo.

html-css.name: HTML & CSS
html-css.instructions: Write a complete webpage using only HTML and CSS. Do not use JS or frameworks. All content must be inside a single index.html file.
